_header: Lent came there afterward that six week I-lasteth
_description: Quadragesima, in the South English Legendary — 170 lines

BodAsh43.First Lines:
LEynte comeþ þer afterward þat six wuke
                    ilasteþ& hor sunnen uorte beten alle cristenmen
                    uasteþ…
BodAsh43.Last Lines:
…So þat he mowe an ester dai wen he haþ al iuastOur
                    lordes flesc vnderuonge þat aswete mossel is last

Bod779.First Lines:
Leynt comeþ þer afterward þat syx wekis
                    lasteþoure synnus alle for to bete alle cristene men
                    fasteþ…
Bod779.Last Lines:
…so þat he mowe on estir day whan he haþ al I
                    vasteoure lordes flesch ondir fongen þat a swete mossel is at þe
                    laste
Bod779.Note: No heading so treated as part of 1301 in this MS.

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Lenton comeþ þer afturward and sixe wikes hit
                    lesteþVr sunnes forto bete alle we cristene men
                    festeþ…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…ffor beodon oþur Almus helpeþ luyte of frend oþur
                    of kunneBote heo beon wiþ oute wraþþhe oþur of dedly
                    sunne
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

BodLauMis463.First Lines:
LEnton comeþ þer after þat sixe wikes
                    lasteþþat here sinne forto bete all Cristen men
                    fasteþ…
BodLauMis463.Last Lines:
…So þat he mowe at ester day whan he haþ al fasteOur
                    lordes flessh vnderfong þat a swete morsel is atte laste
BodLauMis463.Note: Two columns per page, one full-line, the other half-line

BodTan17.First Lines:
LEnte comeþ þeraftirward þat sixe wokis
                    lastiþHere synnes for to bete alle cristen men
                    fastiþ…
BodTan17.Last Lines:
…And ende his lijf in goddis seruyse & euere more to
                    godeÞat we mowe wende & be wiþ him þat bouȝte vs on
                    þe rode

OxfTri57.First Lines:
Leynte comeþ þer after þat sixe wokes
                    ylasteþÞat oure synne for to beete alle cristene men
                    fasteþ…
OxfTri57.Last Lines:
…So þat he mowe in efterday whannehe haþ al y
                    fastOure lordis flesch vnderfonge þat a swete mossel ys
                    last

             “A Critical Edition of Cambridge University MS Ff.5.48.”

CamCCC145.First Lines:
Leinte comeþ þer afterward þat six wike
                    ilasteþÞat hore sunne forto bete alle cristen men
                    vasteþ…
CamCCC145.Last Lines:
…so þat he mowe an esterday wanne he haþ al mastOure
                    louerdes vleyss vnder fonge þat a swete mossle is last

D’Evelyn,  Charlotte,  and  A. J. Mill, eds.

CamKC13.First Lines:
Leynte comeþ þer afterwardþat six wikes y
                    lasteþHare synnes for to bete þanne cristen men
                    fasteþ…
CamKC13.Last Lines:
…So þat he mowe an esterdai whanne he haþ al þi
                    fastOure lordes flesch vnderfonge þat is a swete mossel
                    last

CamMagPep2344.First Lines:
Leynte comeþ þer afterward þat six wykes
                    ylasteþHare sunnes ffor to bete þanne cristene men
                    fasteþ…
CamMagPep2344.Last Lines:
…So þat he mowe on Ester day whanne he haþ al
                    yffastOure lordes fflesch vnderffongy þat is a swete mossel
                    last

CamStJohn28.First Lines:
Lentun comyþ þer afterward þat sixe wowkis
                    lastiþOure synnys for to beten alle cristen men
                    fastiþ…
CamStJohn28.Last Lines:
…so þat he may on Ester day qwan he haþ wel don his
                    fastoure lordys body vnderfongyn þat euere in blisse schal
                    last

CamTCC605.First Lines:
lente comeþ ar Ester þat six wykes lasteþÞat
                    oure synnes be forȝyue alle cristen men fasteþ…
CamTCC605.Last Lines:
…so þat he may an Estere day wan he haþ al y
                    fasteour lordes flesche vndersfonge þat a swet mossel y
                    laste
CamTCC605.Note: Begins verso of leaf after f. 52; no indication of separation from 1301.
CamTCC605.Facsimiles:
Digital Facsimile of Trinity College Cambridge MS R.3.25.

BLCottJulDIX.First Lines: Lente comeþ þer afterwatf þat sex woukes lasteþþat hor sennen for to bete alle cristenmen fasteþ…
BLCottJulDIX.Last Lines: …so þat he mowe anester dai whan he haþ al ifastour lordes slesch vnþerfong þat a suete morsel is last
BLCottJulDIX.Note: “Capitulum xxviii” added to left margin by later hand (f. 52v); last 6 lines of 1301, beginning Septuagesime, assigned chapter xxvii by the later annotator.
BLCottJulDIX.Facsimiles:
Digital Facsimile of British Library  Cotton Julius MS D IX.
         https://www.bl.uk/manuscripts/FullDisplay.aspx?ref=Cotton_MS_Julius_D_IX.

BLEge1993.First Lines: Lente comeþ ar ester þat six wikes lasteþÞat oure sunnes beo forȝiue alle men vasteþ…
BLEge1993.Last Lines: …So þat he mowe an ester day whan e haþ al vastOure lordes vlesch vnderfonge þat so sweit is ate last

BLEge2810.First Lines: Leynt comiþ þereaftirward þat six wouk lasteþþat hor sinnen to bete al cristenmen vasteþ…
BLEge2810.Last Lines: …So þat he may an ester day wan he haþ alli vastVr louerdes flesch vnderuong þat a swet mossel ylast

BLEge2891.First Lines: …And for þan ne beo noman to triste þertoþat he for al ys sorinesse ne beo issriuen also…
BLEge2891.Last Lines: …So þat he mowe an esterday wanne he haþ al yuastOure louerdes fleiss vnderuonge þat a swete mossel last
BLEge2891.Note: Missing lines 1-11: begins incomplete due to loss of folio or folios between 38 and 39.

Lam223.First Lines:
Lentoun comes after þat sixe wekes lastenAnd her synnes forto
                    bete alle cristen men fasten…
Lam223.Last Lines:
…And ende his lyf in goddes seruice & euermore do
                    godeÞat we may wende & be with him þat boȝt vs on
                    þe Rode

TokyoTak54.First Lines:
Sent [sic] commeþ þer afterward and vj wekis
                    lastethHer synnes forto bete all cristen men fasteth…
TokyoTak54.Last Lines:
…So þat he may on Estersday whan he haþ al yfastOur
                    lordys body resceive worþely at last
